name: William (dani maccari, HDchrom, Soul_AvC)
description:
This project was submitted for the UJI 2021 game jam.

Your friend is going through hard times and is looking for support on you. Help or screw him that's up to you.

 Conversational Novel with 5 different endings

CONTROLS:

  • SPACE: continue conversation. (If the answer window displays when pressing space click anywhere on the chat panel, and then click on the "type here" bar.)
  • CLICK: to chose what to answer
DEVS:     Fer Gramage: first programmer @Sir_Guacamole     Dani maccari: artist @Danliduby     Haroun Guechairi: history writer / programmer @HDchrom
